value.title: #2 DAX Fridays! 101: Introduction to filter and row context
value.excerpt: Are you new to DAX and want to learn what those things called filter context and row context are? I will attempt to do just that in today's video. Let me know how I did in the comments :) #dax #powerbi #daxfridays #curbal  Happy friday!  DAX 101 playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDz00l_jz6zwdC_xdTp_QANkHYIzs1BJG&disable_polymer=true

To do that we will create a function that cleans a typical file and then reuse that function

value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending
